welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Capitola, a charming coastal town known for its picturesque beaches and vibrant atmosphere. We invite you to explore our quaint shops, delicious restaurants, and beautiful scenery. Enjoy your stay and soak up the charm of Capitola!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Watsonville Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Watsonville Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reid-Hillview Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marina Municipal Airport offers a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying in on private jets, the private terminal at Marina Municipal Airport provides exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mineta San Jose International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mineta San Jose International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monterey Peninsula Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Monterey Peninsula Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
